TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WorkbookEvents_AfterXmlImportEventHandler(XmlMap Map, bool IsRefresh, XlXmlImportResult Result);
.class public auto ansi sealed WorkbookEvents_AfterXmlImportEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WorkbookEvents_AfterXmlImportEventHandler(Map As XmlMap, IsRefresh As Boolean, Result As XlXmlImportResult)
public delegate void WorkbookEvents_AfterXmlImportEventHandler(XmlMap ^ Map, bool IsRefresh, XlXmlImportResult Result);

Docs.param: Required object. The XML map that will be used to import data.
Required Boolean. True if the event was triggered by refreshing an existing connection to XML data; False if the event was triggered by importing from a different data source.
Required . Indicates the results of the refresh or import operation.
Docs.summary: A Delegate type used to add an event handler for the event. The AfterXmlImport event occurs after an existing XML data connection is refreshed or after new XML data is imported into the specified Microsoft Excel workbook.

remarks.para: XML features, except for saving files in the XML Spreadsheet format, are available only in Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 and Microsoft Office Excel 2003.
